title: API-key Authentication
description:
Enterprise only. Enables a Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) mechanism by reading the `Authorization` header of incoming requests.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/authentication/api-keys/

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.description:
Strategy to identify the API key.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/authentication/api-keys/

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description:
The header name or the query string name containing the API key.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/authentication/api-keys/

keys.title: API Keys
keys.description:
A list of objects defining each API Key.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/authentication/api-keys/

key.title: API Key
key.description:
The secret key used by the client to access the resources. Don't have a key? Execute in the terminal `uuidgen`

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/authentication/api-keys/

roles.title: Roles
roles.description:
All the roles this user has. See roles as all the identifying labels that belong to this client.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/authentication/api-keys/
